divs: Sighting DetailsJust after midnight on new years eve I stood on my deck overlooking Napa Valley watching the lights of the city. From the north came a yellowish red glowing light. I fly and know the what an airplane looks like in the dark. I called my wife out to look as this light began to slowly silently make a turn to the west and back north then stop to hover about two thousand feet high. I had good reference points by the hill tops. There was no other aircraft lights in the sky at that point. Something appeared to drip from the craft red in color and stayed lit half way to ground. Second drip was less bright. Craft a few seconds later lights went out ascraft loosed to fall from sky. About 1000 feet below marking lights of and aircraft appeared going west. Lights of this aircraft different then others I have seen being spaced well apart Two outer in red with four whit between them. No noise. This craft was seen by others on dec. 16,2011 over Napa
